item.description:
Har gao! Shiu Mai! YÃ¼ Chi Gao!
Steamed buns! Sticky rice! Egg tarts and tea!
Chicken feet! Jellyfish!! Trrripe!!!

Join us for our now-monthly, all-social dimsum events, in Boston's Chinatown. We can talk geek, and eat ourselves silly.

Alas, this is probably not for the vegetarian'd, or the strictly kosher or halal, or the diet-conscious. The bill will be split evenly among all who attend, so the more the merrier/cheaper! (Cost is usually less than $15 per person.)

Directions here:
From South Station (Red Line):
Exit through the Amtrak station and turn left on Atlantic Avenue.
At the first light, turn right and cross onto Beach Street.
By the time you see the Chinatown Gate, Hei La Moon will be on your right.

We'll meet on the lobby inside. (Be warned! This place gets packed!)

NOTE IF YOU ARRIVE AFTER 11:30 -- will have probably gone inside. If you've seen us before and can pick us out of the dining hall, come on in. If you're a newbie, there's really no easy way to find us.

For more information, see Hei La Moon

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum Meetup!
